Title: Episode 12
Plot: Meredith confronts Cardwell but he ridicules her and the island refuses to demonstrate its power. Meredith is left furious. Her anger could be dangerous. Meredith is disturbed by the fresh batch of dead fish that have washed up on the shore.
GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Erina Boyd as Rest Home Nurse, Robert Faith as Foreman, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
